title: How Many?
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 72 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 160L
description: How Many? invites students to count different objects in the pictures and learn to recognize number words. Pictures support the text.
highFrequencyWords: arms, candles, eight, eyes, five, four, kites, nine, see, seven, six, smiles, three, two, wheels, windows, wings
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
wordWork:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
